Primi.name: Cheeseburger
Primi.details: Juicy beef patty with melted cheese, lettuce, tomato, and a soft sesame seed bun.

Primi.name: Margherita Pizza
Primi.details: Classic Italian pizza topped with fresh mozzarella, basil, and tomato sauce.

Primi.name: Caesar Salad
Primi.details: Crisp romaine lettuce, Parmesan cheese, croutons, and Caesar dressing.

Primi.name: Chocolate Cake
Primi.details: Rich and moist chocolate cake topped with creamy chocolate frosting.

Primi.name: Grilled Salmon
Primi.details: Freshly grilled salmon filet served with a side of lemon and vegetables.

Primi.name: Pasta Alfredo
Primi.details: Creamy Alfredo sauce served over fettuccine pasta with Parmesan cheese.
